oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baker, Thomas W., 1907 November 11
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A typescript “to R. M. Baker, Administrator of Thomas W. Baker, Dec.d.” regarding an order “to pay into the office of the clerk of said County Court of Davidson Court, the balance … as such administrator in your final settlement with said court, made Sept. the 10th, 1907 …. Illustrates the first page of the document, dated November 11, 1907. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baker family
